channel.title: Eric Bailey - i can haz blog?
channel.description: Varyingly incoherent ramblings of a hacker/musician.

item.title: icanhazip.com
item.description:
Often, I find myself needing to know the public IP address of a box I'm hacking on. icanhazip.com has become my favorite tool for the task.

ùõå curl icanhazip.com # yass, u can

In my experiments it was the fastest, and I've got a penchant for KISS.

I made a gist with a few backups, just in case.
item.dc:creator: Eric Bailey

item.title: i can haz blog?
item.description: So, I installed Ghost and set up a GitHub Pages repo. Now I have a blog, I guess.
item.dc:creator: Eric Bailey
